description:
spec: Use "non-negative" instead of "positive"

Replacing division-by-power-of-2 with right-shift is valid for
zero too.

messages.text: It looks like in the mean time Robert Griesemer also updated the spec today and updated the document date already.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

https://codereview.appspot.com/7027049/diff/6001/doc/go_spec.html
File doc/go_spec.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7027049/diff/6001/doc/go_spec.html#newcode3
doc/go_spec.html:3: "Subtitle": "Version of December 12, 2012",
Please update this date too.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, nigeltao@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=722de23e5fc9 ***

spec: Use "non-negative" instead of "positive"

Replacing division-by-power-of-2 with right-shift is valid for
zero too.
